name: GPT-750M-1024-Phase1.5-Induction
description: Phase 1.5 induction strengthening config. Continue from domain_v5 with ~4B tokens of repetition-rich data (code, dialogue, structured text) to develop robust induction heads. LR same as Phase 2 continuation (3e-5), long warmup to stabilize. ~500k iters for ~1.5 epochs over ~4B mixed tokens (batch_size=12, block_size=1024). Gold checkpoint enabled.
